**************************************************
*
* Topology PlugIn
*
**************************************************

Topology PlugIn is an extension of OpenJUMP 
containing several tools useful to find and/or 
fix topology errors.

Currently (v 0.6.0), it contains :

- Find Misaligned Segments (from JCS)

- Find Overlaps Between Two Layers (from JCS)

- Find Coverage Gaps (from JCS)

- Find Coverage Overlaps in Layer (from JCS)

- Find Close Vertices (from JCS)

- Remove Micro-Segments

- Network Topology Cleaning

- Project Points on Lines
